text: The Stadion Gdańsk (), known for sponsorship reasons as the Polsat Plus Arena Gdańsk since 2021, is a football stadium in Gdańsk, Poland. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home stadium of Lechia Gdańsk. It has a capacity of 41,620. The stadium was built from 2008 to 2011. It was opened on 14 August 2011. == Other websites == * Stadion Gdańsk - official website Category:2011 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Poland Gdansk Category:Buildings and structures in Gdańsk
title: Stadion Gdańsk
